mapper.select: select id from t_job_manage where job_name = #{name} and job_group = #{group} and status = #{status} limit 1

select jm.id, jm.job_name, jm.job_group, jm.class_name, jm.expression, jm.job_order, jm.job_desc, date_format(jm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , jm.create_user_id, jm.status from t_job_manage jm order by jm.job_order desc, jm.id desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
